song_name: Mellon Collie And The Infinite Sadness
metrics_conclusion: Mellon Collie And The Infinite Sadness has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Mellon Collie And The Infinite Sadness has sections analyzed in the following keys: G♯ Dorian,  and C♯ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
